inventory=[{"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "stripped_warped_stem", "quantity": 49, "index": 18}, {"type": "cooked_rabbit", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "jungle_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "birch_sign", "quantity": 3, "index": 28}, {"type": "chorus_fruit", "quantity": 46, "index": 35}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 3, "index": 36}]

thought: To craft a white_bed, I need to first craft warped_planks. To craft warped_planks, I need to place 2 stripped_warped_stem side by side in the crafting table. I will first move the stripped_warped_stem from slot 18 into slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 25 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4
